testsuite.name: test_suites.TS_UI_PMTOOL_04.TC_UI_PMTOOL_04_005
testsuite.system-out: 1. Open Web Application. PMTool home page opens 2. Navigate to Login page and fill the form 3. Verify that the login has been completed 4. Create new project 5. Verify that the project has been created 6. Create new task. Fill the form without the mandatory fields and submit 7. Verify that a validation message is displayed 6. Enter only mandatory fields and submit 7. Verify that a validation message is displayed
